attributes.review: My son is a huge trump fan but I was disappointed on what was on this. It was giving him the wrong idea of trump. It  looked like a great app at the beginning, but I should have known, looks are deceiving. The elephant was going all over the place it’s was first in China. He is still eating ice cream with queen Elizabeth but the sky looked green and it had bugs on the bottom of the cup. Any way not a great app but feel free to download it and experience it for yourself.
attributes.title: Un educational app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app recently and everything I open it, it crashes immediately! I knew something was wrong when pop up error signs flooded my screen, and then my kids were screaming for help downstairs. God, Gary was back home again. He comes every Wednesday, and tries to give the kids melted ice pops. Anyways, this app has been driving me insane. I can’t believe I mistaken it for Tinder in the first place....
attributes.title: Slow, crashes

attributes.review: After my grandma looked over my shoulder onto this app the blinding orange light of trump hit her strong. It caused her to go blind. When she was hospitalized they found that the Orange light had caused tumors to grow in her brain. She was clinically dumb. She couldn’t stop repeating the phrases “Trump 2020” and “All Lives Matter”. This has been very hard on my family. Unfortunately she didn’t make it through surgery. This app causes DEATHS!!! Remove it immediately!
attributes.title: Death in the family 😓😪

attributes.review: Hey if you love facism, racism, and all things awful about humanity you’ve come to the right place. I don’t think Satan himself could have created a more poor excuse of an app/President. And if our Supreme lease does read this review, please do us all a favor and leave! I don’t know anyplace that would accept you, but maybe try Uranus, I hear it’s lovely this time of year—and it would fit perfectly with your aesthetics!
attributes.title: Horrible App from a Horrible Dictator

attributes.review: I got this app so that my family and I could educate ourselves on our president’s campaign. Unfortunately, when I opened the app it kept glitching and then my phone BLEW UP. It started a fire in our house and we had to evacuate. While waiting for the fire department we all stood outside in my driveway. Then out of no where my grandma got ran over by a reindeer. She sadly did not make it. We are all so upset. It wasn’t even Christmas Eve smh.
attributes.title: Will kill your grandma

attributes.review: if 0 stars was an option i’d click 0. first of all, i opened the app and immediately seen this lumpy old man!! that wasn’t a pleasant sight for my eyes. the app is so glitchy too i literally went on it and my phone started cracking and it broke so i had to get a new phone and then i decided to give the app a second try but it broke my phone again. this is my THIRD phone UGH. and then the app told me it’s gonna hurt me so i ran away. DELTE THIS APP OF APPSTORE NEOWWWW
attributes.title: AWFUL AWFUL AWFUL
